title: Illinois confirms Ferguson will miss game at No. 22 Iowa
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Illinois said Thursday that starting running back Josh Ferguson will miss the Illini's game Saturday at No. 22 Iowa because of a shoulder in...
